attributes.action: Protect the immunosupressed. Keep the mask and the 1m rule as a minimum.
attributes.additional_details: Immunosupressed/compromised not fully protected. The mask does not really protect the wearer but protect the others from the wearer. Hence, especially as the Delta mutation is spreading, Freedom day will be our prison and a prison for many more people who are stressed due to the mutation and cases increasing and other sick people too. Please keep the measures for longer.
attributes.background: Do not go ahead with Freedom day until cases start decreasing as opposed to keep increasing. Or as a minimum, wearing masks should still be a legal requirement and the 1m rule whenever possible. Immunosupressed/immunocompromised are not fully protected by the vaccine. Others wearing masks will help.
